meanings.definition: The quality or state of being artificial.
meanings.sent1: The artificialness of the flowers made them look fake.
meanings.sent2: The artificialness of the intelligence in the robot was evident.
meanings.sent3: The artificialness of the cake decorations made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The artificialness of her smile was like a mask hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The artificialness of the plastic fruit was so convincing that it fooled many.

meanings.definition: The fact or quality of being artificial.
meanings.sent1: The artificialness of the situation was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent2: The artificialness of the flavors in the food was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The artificialness of the clown's nose added to the humor of the show.
meanings.sent4: The artificialness of the laughter echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The artificialness of the painting gave it a surreal quality.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being artificial.
meanings.sent1: The artificialness of the fabric made it uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent2: The artificialness of the smile seemed forced.
meanings.sent3: The artificialness of the snow in the movie scene was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The artificialness of the music filled the room with a strange energy.
meanings.sent5: The artificialness of the light made everything appear surreal.
